title: Friday PM Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
DYNAMITE THOR Episode 5: Duty and Heritage

HYPERGAMOUSE Episode 5: Everything A Man Wants

For those who might be interested in knowing more about our future plans for Arktoons, I discussed some of them with Jon Del Arroz on his livestream yesterday. We expect to launch at least three new original series in June, in addition to some new series from independent creators.

DYNAMITE THOR
Episode 5:
Duty and Heritage
HYPERGAMOUSE
Episode 5:
Everything A Man Wants
For those who might be interested in knowing more about our future plans for Arktoons, I discussed some of them with Jon Del Arroz
on his livestream
yesterday. We expect to launch at least three new original series in June, in addition to some new series from independent creators.
